context: I think I have no idea who the heck is Simona Halep, do you?
She is Romanian tennis player, so unless you are a tennis fan, I can see why you did not know.
Well, I grew up with Stan Smith and I know of Serena Williams but, not this Simona.
Well she isn't quite as well known as Serena Williams, I see Stan Smith is from Pasadena, is that your home town too since you grew up together?
Yes, I came also from Pasadena and actually played tennis at the local park with Stan and I also knew Eddie and Alex Van Halen!
resp: Wow, that is incredible! I thought Alex Van Halen was excellent in RoboCop, did you see the movie?
